Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       Hell Beast nods at Shockwave. "Yes, we had better move out, and 
destroy this place. Predacons, begin to pack everything we'll need. Power up 
the transports as well."
       He then turned to Shockwave. "Do you know of a base that might suit 
us?"

       Craken listened to the comm with a bit of confusion. He looked around 
and got comfortable. He thought he just might wait for someone to arrive.

--part1_42.10a98f32.27bafaaa_boundary
